name: @phcode/language-support
description: Language intelligence powering phoenix code, to be run in the browser/web worker env.
author: arun@core.ai

scripts._copyTest: shx mkdir -p test/dist/ && shx cp -r dist/ test/
scripts._build-prod: parcel build src/worker.js --detailed-report && shx mv dist/worker.js dist/language-worker.js && shx mv dist/worker.js.map dist/language-worker.js.map
scripts._build-dev: parcel build src/worker.js --detailed-report --no-optimize && shx mv dist/worker.js dist/language-worker-debug.js && shx mv dist/worker.js.map dist/language-worker-debug.js.map
scripts.build: npm run eslint && npm run _build-dev && npm run _build-prod && npm run _copyTest
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run bumpPatchVersionWithGitTag
